if (!iesg){document.f&&docu
violations.description: This page has no heading elements. Heading elements provide a number of important benefits to users. They can be useful as wayfinding cues for in-page navigation, they can contribute to a summary of the page, and they can provide context to the content below them.
tags: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships

violations.message: This form element has no label.
violations.snippet: <input style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); margin: 0px; padding: 5px 8px 0px 6px; vertical-align: top; outline: none;" autocomplete="off" class="lst" value="" title="Google Search" maxlength="2048" name="q" size="57" dir="ltr" spellcheck="false">
violations.description: Give all controls a label. This allows all users to understand the type of information expected in the field.
tags: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 1.1.1 Non-text Content
Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships
Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 3.3.2 Labels or Instructions
Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value

violations.message: This link has no text inside it.
violations.snippet: <a class="gbgt" id="gbg5" href="http://www.google.com/preferences?hl=en" title="Options" onclick="gbar.tg(event,this)" aria-haspopup="true" aria-owns="gbd5"><span class="gbtb2"></span><span id="gbgs5" class="gbts"><span id="gbi
violations.description: This link has no text in it. Because accessibility APIs use a link's text to determine its accessible name, this link will not have an accessible name, and it will not be announced by assistive technologies. Add text within this link or use `aria-label` to give the link an accessible name.
tags: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context)
Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level AAA: 2.4.9 Link Purpose (Link Only)

violations.snippet: <a class="gbgt" id="gbztm" href="https://www.google.com/intl/en/options/" onclick="gbar.tg(event,this)" aria-haspopup="true" aria-owns="gbd"><span class="gbtb2"></span><span id="gbztms" class="gbts gbtsa"><span id="gbztms1">
violations.description: Do not use generic text in links. Use text in the link that accurately and concisely conveys where the link goes.
tags: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context)
Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level AAA: 2.4.9 Link Purpose (Link Only)

violations.message: This table does not have any headers.
violations.snippet: <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tbody><tr valign="top"><td width="25%">&nbsp;</td><td align="center" nowrap=""><input value="en" name="hl" type="hidden"><input name="source" type="hidden" value="hp
violations.description: This table does not contain any `<th>` elements. If this table is used for layout, replace it with a proper layout controlled with CSS. If that's not possible, add `role="presentation"` to the table.
tags: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level A: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships
